subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:

E-mails: TB family not helpful
TB patient Andrew Speaker's family members weren't forthcoming to health officials before Speaker left the country, e-mails show.

Daughter slain in honor killing
A Kurdish man is convicted by a London court in the murder of his 20-year-old daughter. ITN's Juliet Bremner reports.
